whole_unnormalized_body:
Who We're Looking For

Deloitte’s Debt & Capital Advisory team is seeking an Associate based in Warsaw to support its growing business in Poland and the CEE region. The successful candidate will be expected to have the ability to work across a broad range of debt products and markets and will join a dedicated team focused on raising and restructuring of debt banking and non-banking debt , Structured Finance, Project Finance, Leverage Finance and Alternative Lending space.

This role requires the ability to work in a focused team environment, evidencing strong communication skills and having a very good understanding of financial modelling. The role also requires the individual to have strong written and presentation skills, good organization skills and knowledge and experience in working in transaction-driven environment. This is an excellent opportunity for a highly motivated individual seeking to make a significant impact within a large financial service group by assisting in the continued growth of our dynamic financial advisory business.

We are looking for someone who demonstrates the following personal attributes and qualifications:
  • 1-3 years of relevant (transactional) experience gained within the banking or investment industry with exposure to leveraged finance, debt capital markets, structured finance/securitization, restructuring and/or direct lending, project finance projects,
  • Strong strategic thinking and analytical skills and the ability to translate quantitative analysis to qualitative conclusions,
  • Ability to undertake detailed financial/commercial analysis for inclusion in presentations and client reports,
  • Understanding of banking documentation and legal structuring of debt finance,
  • Excellent analytical skills, including practical knowledge of financial modelling techniques,
  • Excellent written and verbal communication skills – in Polish and English,
  • CFA or ACCA qualification completed or in progress – will be an advantage.

Your future role

As an Associate in our Debt & Capital Advisory Team you will provide high-quality and independent debt & capital advice on the wide range of complex and strategic financing challenges our Clients are facing. Your role within this team will be to help Clients achieve their funding and strategic objectives, which will incorporate a wide range of debt engagements including advice on optimal capital structures, raising acquisition financing or growth financing, execution of refinancing processes and the restructuring of existing debt facilities.

As an Associate you will take an active part in capital raising engagements (debt, mezzanine and quasi-equity), and you will be involved in: data analysis, creation of financial models, providing support in structuring transactions and working on transaction documentation. While most of the DCA team’s activity is focused on Poland you should expect some involvement in transactions located in other Central European countries.

Some of your responsibilities will include, but are not limited to, the following:
  • Taking an active part in all aspects of capital raising engagements (debt, mezzanine and quasi-equity), including in-depth analysis, deal preparation, marketing and deal negotiation,
  • Developing comprehensive financial models,
  • Preparing of information packs, management presentations, financial analysis and Client communications, Industry/company research for both deal origination and transaction analysis.
  • Day-to-day management and coordination of the transactional process with the clients, financing providers, other advisors and stakeholders


What We Offer
  • Competitive salary and social package,
  • Rapid knowledge development thanks to on-the-job trainings related to the area of expertise,
  • Support of the company in gaining additional professional qualifications (ACCA, CFA) and development of skills through a series of Polish and foreign trainings,
  • Continuous professional grow and clear career path,
  • Benefits such as: medical insurance, sports card, participation in various employees sport teams and activities,
  • Free access to: the gym (Calypso Q22), individual physiotherapy services, our network of free bicycles and many more,
  • Friendly work atmosphere and staff parties.


About Deloitte

Deloitte is a variety of people, experience, industries and services we deliver in 150 countries of the world. It is an intellectual challenge, a good starting point for your career, and an excellent opportunity for continuous development and gaining valuable life experiences. What you only must do is to take the first step – press the apply button and send us your CV, go through all the stages of the recruitment process and sign a contract with us. Deloitte is simply your best choice.

About The Team

Debt & Capital Advisory team is an integral part of Deloitte's Financial Advisory practice, providing independent advice and execution on debt market opportunities and conditions, advising on: structuring of new debt issues and refinancing in the bank and debt capital markets, restructuring of under-performing companies (in terms of the capital structures), structuring of acquisition finance for corporates and leveraged buyouts; project finance advisory (including PPP advisory), and asset-based financing. The team works with a full suite of Clients from global Entities to mid-market and smaller private companies.

Our Work Typically Requires Advice On
  • Evaluating business plans for robustness and sensitivity,
  • Capital structure analysis,
  • Financial modelling and debt capacity analysis,
  • Assessing financing products and markets,
  • Managing ongoing relationships with potential funders,
  • Organizing and managing funding competitions,
  • Preparing management presentations and information memoranda,
  • Assessing financing offers and negotiating terms and conditions,
  • Supporting the Client in execution of the debt transactions.

For further information, and to apply, please visit our website via the “Apply” button below.

The Data Science/Statistician Specialist will be responsible for conducting statistical analysis of unique newly created financial monitoring system within Anti Money Laundering program in Citi. He/she will work in a team of more experienced statisticians with global team across the globe and execute complex statistical analysis, e.g. segmentation, and discover and classify patterns of money flows. This is an opportunity to work in a Big Data environment, have a chance to create and implement a new project in Citi, and practice your English on everyday basis. This is a position for graduates who learned quantitative methods and have programming skills (SQL, SAS, R or any other analytical tool) and want to develop their competencies and grow their careers in a global company in a team of experts.

This position requires ability to execute statistical analyses, algorithm simulations and create new tools. Requirements include programming and data processing skills (Big Data as an advantage), as well as some experience in statistical techniques. Fluency in English and very good written and verbal communication skills are necessary.

Key Responsibilities
  • Conduct data-driven analyses and reports; apply qualitative and quantitative data analysis methods; prepare statistical and non-statistical data exploration
  • Apply statistical methods to organize, analyze, and interpret data related to AML monitoring scenarios and thresholds. Ensure appropriate methodology is selected to answer specific business questions on effectiveness of coverage
  • Build and implement algorithms. Maintain high quality code and documentation. Assure efficiency, stability and scalability of the solution
  • Detect data anomalies and identify source of data problems. Recommend data quality solutions.
  • Use visualization techniques to display data and the results of analysis in clear presentations that can be understood by non-technical readers
  • Ensure Data Quality and Reliability. Design and implement various Data Quality methods in SAS and Big Data. Run quality checks against database and report all data issues. Detect data anomalies and identify source of data problems. Recommend data quality solutions

Requirements
  • Master degree in technical science/mathematics/statistics/quantitative methods (degree in economics/banking may be considered if strong analytical skills proved) (4-5th year students may be considered as well)
  • Programming and statistical/data analytical skills (SAS 4GL, SQL, R or other)
  • Experience in data mining methods and their application in business practice as an advantage
  • Initiative, creativity and attention to details
  • Ability to discuss reasoning, critical assessment of facts and opinions
  • Demonstrated ability to communicate effectively, both orally and in writing
  • Self-motivated with high desire of self-development and learning

To Our Employees We Offer
  • Opportunity of professional development in the international and well-established company
  • Learning opportunities and challenging assignments in which you can utilize your knowledge
  • Competitive social benefits (medical care, Benefit System, life insurance and other)
  • Chance for a career evolution within Citi business structures

Development Value
  • Citi provides wide breadth of opportunities within Poland and globally for outstanding candidates: management career within CSC Poland or client/product role within other locations in EMEA

The Remedial Management Officer is a developing professional role. Individual supports remedial managers in developing and implementing workout (recovery) strategies that are intended to either minimize the risks or maximize returns on commercial transactions originated by Commercial Bank office for the purpose of restructuring, stabilizing, or exiting the directly managed accounts. The remedial officer directly supports remedial managers in analytical space, including reserves calculations. Applies analytical thinking and knowledge of data analysis tools and methodologies. Requires attention to detail when making judgments and recommendations based on the analysis of factual information. Daily cooperation with Polish court-related entities and external law firms is also contained within hereby book of work.


Key Responsibilities:

  •  Effective cooperation with court-related entities (bailiffs, trustees etc.) regarding collection portfolio
  • Dealing with internal and external counsel strategically and on a cost effective basis
  • Supporting remedial managers’ analytics including but not limited to forecasting and reserve calculations
  • Automating relevant remedial processes
  • Preparing metrics and reporting criteria for loan performance including local regulatory, internal and external requirements such as FAS 114
  • Preparing valuation and restructuring analysis for stressed and distressed assets and situations, including the determination of write-off, reserve and risk of loss amounts that directly impact the P&L of the firm
  • Working closely with other colleagues (Seniors and Senior Credit Officer-level transactors) to remain coordinated on the restructuring/valuation process and situations
  • Evaluating and processing data, historical information and “KYC”
  • Handling local regulatory asks as well as cooperating with relevant internal control functions
  • Timely and pro-active cooperation with key partners within the organization incl. Business, Risk, Operations, Legal, Finance


Competencies:

  • Sound understanding of credit risk management tools and techniques
  • Solid knowledge of collection related processes in Poland
  • Excellent analytical skills including relevant calculation tools is a must
  • Strong ability to communicate and influence in a cross functional environment in settings that could involve conflicting priorities and timetables
  • Self-starter 


Qualifications:

  • Very good command of English
  • Bachelor’s degree with 3+ years of commercial banking experience with an emphasis on credit analysis
  • Experienced in collection processes for commercial customers
  • Strong communication skills with ability to synthesize the argument in a logical and rational manner
  • Ability to work well under pressure and multi-task
  • Very good computer skills – MS Office incl. Excel, Access


As an employer we offer:

  • Professional development experience through work in one of the top international banking institutions
  • Work in a team expert openly sharing their knowledge
  • Participation in challenging projects
  • Rich social package (such as: medical care, fitness card, life insurance, pension plan)

 

The role of Remedial Management Officer is located at Bank Handlowy S.A. in Warsaw:

https://www.citi.com/Careers/policies/pdf/BankHandlowyPolandPrivacyNotice.pdf

The Compliance AML KYC Unit Supervisor is an intermediate management-level position responsible for providing full leadership and direction to a team of employees to provide Anti-Money Laundering (AML) monitoring, governance, oversight and regulatory reporting services in coordination with the Compliance and Control team. The overall objective of this role is to ensure the development and management of a dedicated internal KYC (Know Your Client) program at Citi.

Responsibilities
  • Advise a KYC a Compliance and Controls team (10+ employees)
  • Complete KYC records with accurate client information and documentation in a timely manner
  • Ensure information and documentation complies with local regulation and Citi standards
  • Update KYC forms and client profiles according to policy requirements
  • Follow up with clients to ensure information is received on time
  • Perform KYC tasks, including monitoring and tracking of the KYC records and Appendix approval process, assisting with the development and execution of action planning for expiring records, and ensuring records are not past due
  • Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency, as well as effectively supervise the activity of others and create accountability with those who fail to maintain these standards.

Qualifications
  • 0-2 years of relevant experience
  • Bachelor's degree/University degree or equivalent experience

We Offer
  • Possibility to work with professionals in the multicultural environment
  • Opportunity to develop in an international environment in one of the greatest financial institution worldwide
  • Opportunity to broaden the practical knowledge how Capital Markets operate
  • Social benefits (medical care, Benefit System, life insurance)
  • Access to a dynamic variety of training material & courses across multiple delivery platforms
  • Opportunity to use English on a daily basis

Responsibilities
  • Partner with Relationship Management and Compliance teams to assist with the preparation, development, due diligence and approval of the electronic Know Your Client (KYC) record and supporting appendices
  • Create and maintain KYC records by obtaining information from internal and external sources (firm website, regulatory websites, etc.)

  • Validate the information within KYC records and Customer Identification Program (CIP) documents to ensure completion and accuracy
  • Ensure KYC records incorporate local regulatory requirements / Global Business Support Unit (BSU) Standards
  • Maintain BSU tool
  • Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm's reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency.

  • Previous relevant experience preferred (AML/KYC would be an asset)
  • Fluent Turkish language - is a must
  • Fluent English language

Talentuno to platforma stworzona by wspierać talenty przy wykorzystaniu potęgi crowdsourcingu. Pragniemy umożliwić każdemu stanie się częścią branży rekrutacyjnej i czerpanie z niej korzyści.

Talentuno wykorzystuje technologię, by wspierać każdego w procesie polecania swoich znajomych na otwarte stanowiska i zarabianiu na tym. Nasz napędzany przez technologię system biznesowy umożliwia firmom skuteczniejsze pozyskiwanie Kandydatów przy o wiele niższych kosztach.

Demokratyzując branżę rekrutacji, firmy zyskują dostęp do tysięcy rekruterów-freelancerów pracujących na ich sukces. W ten sposób rozwiązujemy odwieczny problem dostępu do zasobów ludzkich.

Obecnie poszukujemy osoby na stanowisko: Digital Analyst

Zakres Obowiązków
  • przeprowadzanie analiz środowiska online, na potrzeby jednostek odpowiedzialnych za sprzedaż, marketing, rozwój produktów.
  • komunikację z jednostkami biznesowymi w zakresie dostarczania wniosków z analiz oraz rekomendacji optymalizacji środowiska e-commerce
  • konfiguracja i stały monitoring ruchu w sklepach internetowych, proponowanie zmian zwiększających sprzedaż
  • konfiguracja Google Analytics oraz Google Tag Manager na potrzeby projektów
  • wdrażanie skryptów Google Analytics za pomocą Google Tag Manager,
  • przygotowanie raportów z wykorzystaniem Google Data Studio

Oczekiwania
  • minimum 1 rok doświadczenia w pracy na podobnym stanowisku
  • znajomość narzędzi Google: Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Data Studio. Doświadczenie w realizacji projektów analitycznych wykorzystujących te narzędzia
  • wysokie umiejętności analityczne
  • samodzielność, duża chęć do nauki
  • znajomość języka angielskiego na poziomie min. B1

Wykształcenie
  • preferowane Analiza Danych, Informatyka, Matematyka

Mile Widziane
  • znajomość SQL na poziomie podstawowym
  • doświadczenie w pracy z Google Cloud Platform
  • doświadczenie w pracy z narzędziami Marketing Automation

Oferujemy
  • Rowerowy raj: stojaki na rowery, przeglądy rowerowe, szafki dla rowerzystów
  • Owocowe wtorki
  • Godziny dla rodziny
  • Dzień wolny w Twoje urodziny
  • Prywatna opieka medyczna
  • Kluby sportowe, akcje CSR, konkursy - firma to nie tylko praca
  • System gamifikacji z nagrodami dla pracowników
  • Dofinansowanie do pakietu sportowego

Elastyczne godziny pracy

You will be working in a growing analyticsteam, providing analytics and conversion rate optimization servicesto clients such as KFC, IKEA, Nationale Nederlanden and HEBE. Thetools you will be working on include the Google suite of products,Amplitude and FullStory. Why become a Bison? -You will become partof Flying Bisons team, which is one of the fastest growingcompanies in the Digital Consulting industry. Our mission is toco-create valuable and innovative products that are used daily byhundreds of thousands of people. -As a Bison, you will have a realimpact on the success of strategic products of the biggest brandsin the world including IKEA, Mercedes-AMG, KFC, HEBE, Empik,Domino’s Pizza, Getin Bank, NC+, Nationale Nederlanden and startupslike Going, Muscat, Vaiot and Hoard. -You will be part of a growinganalytics team which has extensive experience in deliveringend-to-end digital analytics processes, as well as on-goingoptimization projects such Conversion Rate Optimization and A/Btesting. -Besides the analytics team, you will work with aninterdisciplinary team of ambitious and talented specialists.Together, we will be able to take advantage of our experience,supported by qualitative and quantitative data to make the rightdesign decisions, meet our clients’ business goals and participatein product success. - You will be a part of the entire DigitalAnalytics process which also involves continuous improvements longafter product release:
  • Discovery
  • Strategy
  • Concept &Validation
  • Design (UX/UI)
  • Development
  • Optimization(including A/B Testing) -You will work in a climatic office in thevery center of Warsaw (Bracka 18) -You will relax playing FIFA,Billiards, and ping-pong with other cool Bisons!

IT Support Specialist

Naszym Klientem jest międzynarodowa Firma, lider rynku FMCG i sprzedaży, który swoją wiedzą i kapitałem wspiera swoich Klientów zarówno na rodzimym rynku jak i rynkach zargranicznych.

Aktualnie poszukujemy Kandydatów na stanowisko IT Support Specialist. Do głównych zadań na tym stanowisku będzie należeć obsługa systemu ticketowego dla użytkowników firmy w środowisku Windows 10, zgłaszanie problemów systemowych (m.in. poprzez Jira), działania w Active Directory, wsparcie procesu zakupowego sprzętu IT, tworzenie instrukcji serwisowych dla I linii wsparcia.

Nasz Klient Oferuje
  • Atrakcyjne wynagrodzenie na podstawie kontraktu B2B lub umowy zlecenie
  • Zatrudnienie na czas trwania projektu z możliwością rozwoju w strukturach firmy
  • Udział w szkoleniach z zakresu działania/eksploatacji środowiska IT
  • Możliwość nauki poruszania się po środowiskach wirtualnych oraz SQL
  • Prywatną opiekę medyczną, bezpłatny parking, dofinansowania do karty sportowej, posiłków oraz zniżki na produkty związane z działalnością firmy.

U Kandydatów Zwracamy Uwagę Na
  • Doświadczenie we wsparciu na I linii IT (oferta jest świetną możliwością nauki oraz awansu dla zmotywowanych osób)
  • Wykształcenie wyższe lub w trakcie studiów
  • Bardzo dobrą znajomość języka angielskiego
  • Dyspozycyjność do pracy w trybie zmianowym (również weekendy)
  • Komunikatywność, samodzielność i zorganizowanie

Devire to międzynarodowa firma specjalizująca się w usługach rekrutacji, outsourcingu i employer brandingu. Od ponad 30 lat reprezentujemy wiodących pracodawców na rynku europejskim, prowadząc kompleksowe projekty poszukiwań menedżerów i wyspecjalizowanej kadry, wdrażając najnowsze rozwiązania z obszaru usług IT oraz wspierając w budowaniu wizerunku pracodawcy z wyboru.

Nasze biura zlokalizowane są w Warszawie, Wrocławiu, Poznaniu, Katowicach oraz Monachium, Frankfurcie, Pradze i Hradec Kralove.

Jakie zadania na Ciebie czekają?
  • Rozmowa z klientami (głównie telefoniczna) o ich potrzebach w zakresie wynajmu przestrzeni do pracy (przestrzeń coworking’owa/sale spotkań/przestrzeń do organizacji event’ów/kilkuosobowy pokój do pracy)
  • Zaproponowanie najlepszego rozwiązania dopasowanego do potrzeb klienta
  • Budowanie długofalowych relacji z dostawcami przestrzeni
  • Wizyty w przestrzeniach cooworkingowych, dbałość, aby to co pokazujemy na stronie internetowej miało odzwierciedlenie w rzeczywistości
  • Aktualizacja naszej strony internetowej www.spacing.pl wartościowymi treściami (zdjęcia przestrzeni, ceny, opisy)

Kogo szukamy?
  • Osoby, która ma już pierwsze doświadczenie w pracy z klientem - około 12-miesięczne
  • Absolwenta lub studenta studiów zaocznych – potrzebujemy dyspozycyjności na pełen etat
  • Biegłej znajomości języka angielski - jesteśmy międzynarodową firmą, pracujemy na zagranicznych systemach, ale przede wszystkim będziesz komunikował się ze swoim managerem oraz z innymi oddziałami Spacing po angielsku
  • Kogoś, kto poważnie traktuje swoje obowiązki, jest odpowiedzialny i zaangażowany oraz lubi jak w koło dużo się dzieje
  • Osoby, dla której kontakt f2f z klientem nie stanowi problemu – pewnej siebie, komunikatywnej.

Co zapewniamy?
  • Wynagrodzenie 3000 netto
  • Umowę o pracę (okres próbny, potem czas nieokreślony)
  • Super przestrzeń do pracy – Twoje biuro znajdzie się w jednej z przestrzeni Brain Embassy
  • Dostęp do warsztatów, szkoleń, lekcji języka angielskiego, jogi organizowanych przez zespół Brain Embassy
  • Dużą samodzielność - będziesz managerem własnego czasu, a ze swoim managerem będziesz pracował głównie zdalnie.


We Have Online Market Places In The Field Of Flexible Office In Israel, London And New York And Now We Are Looking For Someone Who Will Represent Us In Poland And Take a Position Of

Spacing was founded in order to give tenants a smart and simple tool for comparing coworking spaces around the world, and a source for receiving all the relevant information needed to make the correct choice of your next coworking space.

CLIENT SUCCESS SPECIALIST

Location: Warsaw

What tasks are waiting for you?
  • Talking with our clients (mainly by phone) about their needs for renting work space (coworking space / meeting rooms / space for events / room for several)
  • Proposing the best solution tailored to the client's needs
  • Building long-term relationships with space providers
  • Visiting co-working spaces, taking care about cohesion between content on our website and reality
  • Updating our website www.spacing.pl with valuable content (photos, prices, descriptions)

Who are we looking for?
  • Person who already has the first work experience with clients - about 12 months, and feels comfortable and confident with face to face contact
  • Graduate or extramural student - we need full-time availability
  • Fluency in English - we are an international company, we work on foreign systems, but above all you will communicate with your manager and other Spacing branches in English
  • Someone who takes his responsibilities seriously, is involved and engaged
  • If multitasking is something you are looking for – we can for sure give it to you :)
  • CV in english

What are we offering?
  • Salary 3000 net
  • Employment contract (trial period, then indefinite period)
  • Unique working space - your office will be located in one of the Brain Embassy spaces
  • Access to workshops, trainings, English lessons, yoga organized by the Brain Embassy team
  • Great independence - you will be the manager of your own time, and with your manager you will work mainly remotely.

Specyfika Pracy

Zbiór szparagów na polu, budowanie tuneli nad rzędami szparag, przykrywanie ich prześcieradłami, zbieranie, czyszczenie i sortowanie szparag.

MIEJSCE PRACY: Holandia, Kessel

Oferujemy

– atrakcyjne wynagrodzenie €10,05/h
– wypłacane co tydzień
– zakwaterowanie na czas zatrudnienia
– ubezpieczenie
– pomoc polskojęzycznego koordynatora na miejscu
– legalną pracę u sprawdzonego klienta
– przejazd z miejsca zakwaterowania bezpłatny
– mile widziana znajomość języka angielskiego
– prawo jazdy kat B
– mile widziane doświadczenie przy tego typu pracy

Delivery Assistant
Location - Warsaw

Duties & Responsibilities
  • Organize shipments according to internal rules and guarantee timely deliveries.
  • Ensure correct flow of products
  • Plan and create deliveries
  • Timely processing of incoming signals for deliveries creation
  • Create all required documents necessary for transport and customs clearance
  • Instruct and liaise with customer service and forwarders to prepare and arrange the execution of the shipment of goods
  • Daily contact with logistic partner
  • Monitor deliveries in order to ensure timely delivery to final destination
  • Communicate with Customer Service /Plants/Warehouses/Replenishment if requested delivery date cannot be meet
  • SAP data management
  • Create shipments / PGI in SAP in timely manner allowing invoicing to final customer
  • Handle complaints and return shipments
  • Maintain, correct documentation in requested files, records and internal documents

    • The Individual
  • Fluency in English both written and spoken
  • Min. bachelor’s degree in Logistics, Supply Chain or similar area
  • Working knowledge of office applications such as Excel, Outlook and Word
  • Strong communication and interpersonal skills, as well as ability to work in a multicultural environment
  • Team player, multitasking ability, detail oriented with attitude “can do”, quick learner

    • Nice to have
  • Experience in customer service, supply chain, logistic or back office
  • Experience in using ERP Systems /SAP will be a plus

    • Salary & Benefits
  • Possibility to grow and gain knowledge within Delivery Processing area in stable, multinational environment
  • Competitive benefits package (Medicover, Multisport and more)
  • Home Office policy
  • Company meetings and events every few months
  • Fruit and massages in the office

  • Comfortable working conditions in Testronic Warsaw office at Poleczki 21A (Ursynów)
  • The ability to use your knowledge of a foreign language daily at work

  • Training and development to help you achieve your potential

As a Customer Support Agent You Will
  • Handle customer complaints via offline channels (i.e. chat, email)
  • Provide appropriate solutions and alternatives, follow up to ensure resolution
  • Identify and assess customer needs to achieve satisfaction
  • Build sustainable relationships and trust with customer accounts through open and interactive communication
  • Provide accurate, valid and complete information by using the correct methods/tools
  • Keep records of customer interactions, process customer accounts and file documents
  • Take the extra mile to engage customers

  • The ability to multi-task while also prioritizing and managing time effectively
  • Customer oriented with the ability to adapt, and respond, to different types of characters

  • Passion for video games
  • Basic IT and MS Excel skills

Key Responsibilities
  • Supervising, monitoring and evaluating KPIs/SLAs and overall department’s performance
  • Future planning of workload and resources of the team, with development of individuals to achieve this.
  • Staff motivation, appraisal, development and training.
  • Reviewing internal control policies and procedures with internal and external auditor
  • Identify process improvements and coordinate execution of improvement project
  • Ensure policies, procedures and process manuals are valid and updated regularly.
  • Ensuring accuracy and completeness of financial and management reports.
  • Keeping relations with internal and external stakeholders, escalating and addressing issue
  • Ad hoc analysis and reports based on internal needs and Clients request
  • Co-operation with the Property Managers to ensure that service charge information is accurate and submitted on a timely basi
  • Ensuring smooth cooperation in terms of service charge reconciliation, reviewing actuals vs budgeted cost

  • Advanced English level (at least C1)
  • Very good MS Excel skill
  • Experience in Real Estate Market would be an asset
  • Strong analytical skills with great attention to detail
  • Stand-alone approach to business challenge
  • Strong communication skill
  • Ability to forecast potential automation within the proce

Oferujemy:
  • Opportunity to gain experience in a professional, multinational corporate environment
  • Opportunity to grow with the team and experience lively, energetic and friendly work atmosphere
  • Multilingual (12 languages used in everyday work) environment across EMEA
  • Private medical care with a very attractive offer
  • Competitive benefit package (life insurance, partly funded language lessons, sport & recreation allowance)
  • Work place located in a quickly developing office district with an easy access to public transport
  • New office place in a recently finished, modern building

READY FOR NEW PROFESSIONAL CHALLENGES?

YOUNG PROFESSIONAL PROGRAMME

Our trainee programme starts in September 2020 and lasts one year. Within the programme you can specialize either in the operative daily business or in finance and get to know three selected departments each in 4 months within the framework of a job rotation. Meetings across different divisions provide a complete overview of the company.
Training on the job allows you to work on real projects as well as spend time abroad on a project basis.

You Are Looking For
  • … an international environment
  • … in which you can take responsibility
  • … and work practice-oriented.
Then become part of our successful team!

IMMOFINANZ is looking for young talents for the Young Professional Programme who are motivated and want to build the basis for a successful career within 12 months.

APPLICATIONS FOR THE YOUNG PROFESSIONAL PROGRAMME ARE POSSIBLE FROM SPRING 2020!

This is an exciting opportunity to join ICON

ICON has an opportunity for a Study Support Assistant (SSA). Our Study Support Assistant's at ICON play a key role, independently assisting the team to ensure the most effective and efficient study start up, by providing administrative and tracking support.

Study Support Assistant role within ICON

  • As a SSA, you will support the Study Start up Associate with tasks including; tracking, filling, collating and verifying, for completeness, submission documentation for submission to the Regulatory/Competent Authority (CA)/Ethics Committee(EC) and other relevant authorities and assisting in the translation of these documents
  • Assist the team with submission progress tracking by updating the relevant ICON/Sponsor tracking system. Be competent with ICON/Sponsor Clinical Trial Management System (CTMS).
  • Set, up, organize and maintain department electronic filing systems. Organize and attend meetings as requested and assist in the production of slides, overheads etc as needed
  • Assist in the co-ordination of payments to CA/EC and other relevant authorities and be familiar with ICH GCP and relevant ICON SOPs
Role Profile

  • The successful candidate will have a high school diploma, or local equivalent with good organizational skills and the ability to manage multiple tasks with meticulous attention to detail
  • Research or Healthcare related academic or work experience would be preferable but not essential
  • Good written and spoken English required for country assignments

Jesteśmy niezależną agencją marketingową , która działa na rynku od ponad 10 lat. Specjalizujemy się w event marketingu, produkcji materiałów POS na rynek Polski i EEC, projektowaniu graficznym oraz digitalu, posiadamy własne studio 3D. W agencji pracuje 30 specjalistów, którzy szczególny nacisk kładą na innowacyjne rozwiązania i najwyższą jakość świadczonych usług. Rozwijamy się w kierunku agencji full-service, która dostarcza kompleksowe rozwiązania dla obecnych i przyszłych Klientów. W portfolio mamy projekty o zasięgu lokalnym i międzynarodowym, zrealizowane dla takich Klientów jak: Bacardi-Martini, Brown-Forman, DOZ S.A., Panattoni Europe, Amica SA, McKinsey Company, Mobil 1, Mercedes-Benz Polska etc.
Jeżeli pragniesz rozwijać się przy projektach światowych marek, do tego nie boisz się wyzwań, dynamicznej pracy, to dołącz do naszego zespołu.

Traffic Coordinator

OPIS STANOWISKA

  • wsparcie Project Managerów w traffickowaniu projektów, planowanie prac w dziel kreacji oraz jej podział i koordynacja pomiędzy zespołami,
  • kontrola i bieżąca korekta prac zespołu kreacji, monitoring harmonogramów oraz postępu zaplanowanych działań,
  • regularne śledzenie i aktualizowanie statusów projektów,
  • wsparcie bieżącej komunikacji pomiędzy zespołami,
  • rozwiązywanie bieżących problemów projektowych i utrzymanie płynności pracy,
  • wewnętrzne raportowanie i ewaluacja zrealizowanych projektów.

OCZEKUJEMY

  • doskonała organizacja czasu własnego, planowania pracy zespołu i ustalania priorytetów,
  • umiejętność prowadzenia wielu projektów jednocześnie, zarządzania harmonogramami i terminowej dostawy projektów,
  • dobra energia i życzliwość, umiejętność słuchania i przekazywania precyzyjnych informacji,
  • inicjatywa i samodzielność w działaniu,
  • wyjątkowa dbałość o szczegóły,
  • myślenie nieszablonowe, zadaniowe podejście do rozwiązywania problemów i trudności,
  • cierpliwość i umiejętność pracy pod presją czasu.

OFERUJEMY

  • możliwość zdobywania nowych doświadczeń w dynamicznym zespole i nowocześnie zarządzanej firmie,
  • doskonałą atmosferę pracy w kameralnym środowisku,
  • wynagrodzenie 4000-6000zł na rękę ( w zależności od doświadczenia).

Zbudowali śmy silny zespół specjalistów z obszaru konceptów strategicznych i kreacji, event marketingu oraz digitalu. Innowacyjność naszych rozwiązań to mieszanka eksperckiej wiedzy i nieszablonowych osobowości naszego teamu.

Prosimy o dołączenie oświadczenia następującej treści: „Wyrażam zgodę na przetwarzanie moich danych osobowych zawartych w CV na potrzeby obecnego oraz przyszłych procesów rekrutacji prowadzonych przez HOLO J. Pawlak, P. Wójtowicz Sp. J.” Administratorem Twoich danych osobowych pozyskanych w procesie rekrutacyjnym jest HOLO J. Pawlak, P. Wójtowicz Sp. J. z siedzibą w Warszawie, Al. Wilanowska 97c. Dane, które dobrowolnie nam przekazałeś możesz poprawić lub usunąć w dowolnym momencie. Nierozpatrzone CV w danym procesie rekrutacji są przechowywane przez okres niezbędny na potrzeby kolejnych procesów rekrutacji. Po tym okresie są usuwane, a dane osobowe kandydatów nie są przetwarzane w żadnym innym celu.

Jesteśmy niezależną agencją marketingową , która działa na rynku od ponad 10 lat. Specjalizujemy się w event marketingu, produkcji materiałów POS na rynek Polski i EEC, projektowaniu graficznym oraz digitalu, posiadamy własne studio 3D. W agencji pracuje 30 specjalistów, którzy szczególny nacisk kładą na innowacyjne rozwiązania i najwyższą jakość świadczonych usług. Rozwijamy się w kierunku agencji full-service, która dostarcza kompleksowe rozwiązania dla obecnych i przyszłych Klientów. W portfolio mamy projekty o zasięgu lokalnym i międzynarodowym, zrealizowane dla takich Klientów jak: Bacardi-Martini, Brown-Forman, DOZ S.A., Panattoni Europe, Amica SA, McKinsey Company, Mobil 1, Mercedes-Benz Polska etc.
Jeżeli pragniesz rozwijać się przy projektach światowych marek, do tego nie boisz się wyzwań, dynamicznej pracy, to dołącz do naszego zespołu.

Traffic Coordinator

OPIS STANOWISKA

  • wsparcie Project Managerów w traffickowaniu projektów, planowanie prac w dziel kreacji oraz jej podział i koordynacja pomiędzy zespołami,
  • kontrola i bieżąca korekta prac zespołu kreacji, monitoring harmonogramów oraz postępu zaplanowanych działań,
  • regularne śledzenie i aktualizowanie statusów projektów,
  • wsparcie bieżącej komunikacji pomiędzy zespołami,
  • rozwiązywanie bieżących problemów projektowych i utrzymanie płynności pracy,
  • wewnętrzne raportowanie i ewaluacja zrealizowanych projektów.

OCZEKUJEMY

  • doskonała organizacja czasu własnego, planowania pracy zespołu i ustalania priorytetów,
  • umiejętność prowadzenia wielu projektów jednocześnie, zarządzania harmonogramami i terminowej dostawy projektów,
  • dobra energia i życzliwość, umiejętność słuchania i przekazywania precyzyjnych informacji,
  • inicjatywa i samodzielność w działaniu,
  • wyjątkowa dbałość o szczegóły,
  • myślenie nieszablonowe, zadaniowe podejście do rozwiązywania problemów i trudności,
  • cierpliwość i umiejętność pracy pod presją czasu.

OFERUJEMY

  • możliwość zdobywania nowych doświadczeń w dynamicznym zespole i nowocześnie zarządzanej firmie,
  • doskonałą atmosferę pracy w kameralnym środowisku,
  • wynagrodzenie 4000-6000zł na rękę ( w zależności od doświadczenia).

Zbudowali śmy silny zespół specjalistów z obszaru konceptów strategicznych i kreacji, event marketingu oraz digitalu. Innowacyjność naszych rozwiązań to mieszanka eksperckiej wiedzy i nieszablonowych osobowości naszego teamu.

HR Specialist

Zakres obowiązków
  • Ensuring proper maintenance of personal files and administration;
  • Preparing comprehensive employee documentation;
  • Maintaining current employee data and organizational structure in required databases;
  • Ensuring the completeness of working time documentation and the current state of holiday entitlements of employees;
  • Comprehensive service and control of statutory training and other obligations as required by labor law.
  • Administrative support of a private medical care program for employees;
  • Maintaining of the cafeteria platform, with a database on company benefits and ensuring its proper operation.
  • Preparing appropriate HR (personnel) reports for statistical purposes (GUS);
  • Cyclic reporting;
  • Annual verification of employee data to ensure a correct planning process for salary increases and bonuses.
Poszukiwane kompetencje
  • Fluency in English, both verbal and written;
  • Good time management skills and independence;
  • Customer service experience;
  • Working knowledge of HR systems;
  • Good communication skills.
Oferujemy

  • Stable employment based on a contract of employment
  • Private medical care
  • Multi-sport card
  • Opportunity to work on diverse and complex projects
